welcome_message_body: Welcome to Athurugiriya, a charming city in Sri Lanka known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ratmalana Airport is a small and modern building, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ratmalana Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight to and from the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bandaranaike International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
